page.title: 06Fixed services in Vernham CP
page.content: None of the dwellings in the area are connected to the main drainage system. They are either connected to a septic tank or a cess pit. Likewise none of the dwellings are connected to the main gas supply. Where gas is required, for cooking or heating, it is either in the form of bottled gas or is delivered in liquid form to tanks. Electricity is available to all dwellings, but because the supply is by way of overhead cables it is subject to disruption from high winds and snow. Most dwellings are connected to the main water system, although one or two retain their own water supply.
